thoughts.reasoning: Using the 'get_text_summary' command can help me get a summary of a website's content without having to read through the entire website.

- Use the 'get_text_summary' command to get a text summary of a website.
- Specify the URL of the website.
- Specify the question to summarize.
- Open the website in a web browser.
- Find the relevant text on the website.
- Use a summarization algorithm to generate a summary of the text.
- Output the summary to the user.
